main event: On 9 May 1961, a sighting was reported of an unidentified object over Okinawa, observed using ground radar.
interesting points: The object was reported to be the size and shape of a double-winged aircraft with trailing red lights., It exhibited no sound and moved rapidly in a vertical oscillating motion., There were multiple observers including airborne personnel., The weather conditions during the observation were clear., The object vanished suddenly after reaching its apex and beginning descent.
sighted object: an unidentified object with red lights
witness description: Ground and airborne observers, including military personnel
